text: WZZU is a classic rock formatted broadcast radio station licensed to Lynchburg, Virginia, serving the Lynchburg/Lexington area. WZZU is owned and operated by Todd Robinson's WVJT, LLC. ==References== ==External links== *97.9 The Planet Online * ZZU Category:Radio stations established in 1970 Category:1970 establishments in Virginia Category:Classic rock radio stations in the United States
title: WZZU
